setting.name: *use_team_colors
setting.desc: Use team colors for player blips.

setting.name: *use_nametag_colors
setting.desc: Use nametag colors for player blips. Takes precedence over team colors.

setting.name: *blip_color
setting.desc: Default blip color. Used if team and nametag colors are not used.

setting.name: *blip_range
setting.desc: Player blip visibility range on the minimap. Blips are always visible on the map.
